data.name: VTmini
data.detailed_description:
Based on motion capture system, the cloud operating platform developed independently by Super ACG can map real-time action, expression and voice of real-life actors to virtual characters by adapting the integrated expression capture technology in virtual talent system and combining with real-time rendering and voice control systems.

functions：
  • Virtual Characters
  • Facial Capture
  • Motion Capture
  • Multiplayer online
  • Prop
  • Pose
  • wink
  • Camera
  • more……

In some places, English and Japanese localization within the software is still incomplete. We will revise it as soon as possible

Dear friends, after investigation, it is found that the face mapping of the VRM model exported from the new vroid model is incompatible with the old version. At present, it is being adjusted. Please wait patiently. Thank you~
Capable partners can adjust the model in blender / unity and other software, and import it after modification.

Contact us
QQ Group 626061141

data.short_description: Vtmini is a desktop level virtual live broadcasting system tailored for small teams. More convenient handling and low hardware cost greatly reduce the access threshold of virtual anchor, so that everyone can become a virtual anchor.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I3-4130 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT740 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For image based tracking you need a webcam.For sound base tracking you need a microphone.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-10400 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For image based tracking you need a webcam.For sound base tracking you need a microphone.
